ej,ordom001,P,crawj901,Bench-clearing brawl (1st of 2) ej,simab001,P,crawj901,Bench-clearing brawl (1st of 2) ej,fickr001,P,crawj901,Bench-clearing brawl (1st of 2) ej,palmd002,P,crawj901,Bench-clearing brawl (1st of 2) ej,pattd001,P,crawj901,Bench-clearing brawl (1st of 2) ej,manuj101,M,crawj901,Bench-clearing brawl (1st of 2) Dean Palmer rushed the mound after being hit and threw his helmet at Parque; both benches emptied and a brawl ensued; Tigers backup catcher Robert Fick returned to the bullpen, began taunting fans and was doused with beer thrown by fans; the following players were ejected by crew chief Jerry Crawford: Magglio Ordonez, Bill Simas, Robert Fick, Dean Palmer, Danny Patterson along with White Sox manager Jerry Manuel

ej,sturt001,P,everm901,Intentional HBP ej,nossj101,C,everm901,Intentional HBP ej,brocd001,P,crawj901,Bench-clearing brawl (2nd of 2) $A second brawl occurs here; Tanyon Sturtze, Doug Brocail and White Sox coach (and acting manager) Joe Nossek ejected by HP umpire Mike Everitt; the game resulted in 16 players being suspended for a total of 82 games; Tigers manager Phil Garner and White Sox manager Jerry Manuel were suspended 8 games each, Tigers coach Juan Samuel was suspended 15 games for throwing punches; nine others were fined; Keith Foulke suffered a facial cut that required 5 stitches
